SCTP_LINK_DOWN.probableCause: CU-CP is down or SCTP link to CU-CP is down.
SCTP_LINK_DOWN.specificProblem: Peer node failure or SCTP link failure to peer node.
SCTP_LINK_DOWN.proposedRepairAction: Check the state of peer CU-CP. Check the connectivity of CU-CP from CU-UP. Check SCTP and IP configuration.

SCTP_LINK_UP.probableCause: CU-CP operational or SCTP link restored.
